name: Plaza Car Parking Manager:City
description:
Plaza Car Parking Manager: City Car Parking Simulation is dynamic arcade racing city trip on the car with cusp of modern car parking and city driving. Drive down the legendary high speed highways test the limit of your modern car parking skills as well as show your city prado driving guts in this luxury prado city drive:car driving games, which is a prado car simulator.
Features:
• multi level story parking
• Amazing 3D graphics for parking cars
• latest car models
• 30 levels with different parking technique
• Easy Control
